result.title: Invitation for CODE-IT 2018
result.content:
Hi Everyone!

I invite you all to participate in CODE-IT 2018, an online coding event organized as a part of Integration 2018, the techno-cultural fest of Indian Statistical Institute, Kolkata.

Event time in Your Zone

We tried to make the questions as interesting as we could. Happy Coding and hope to see you all in the coding round.

Note: The Prize money will be given to top three Indian contestants only.

To register: Click Here
